attributes.long-description:
Become part of London's elite criminal underworld. Control a team of gangsters to orchestrate the most ruthless takeover of the city's criminal underworld. Use brains and brawn as you take more and more territory. Play through a fully realized free roaming London in powerful action packed missions perfectly tailored for portable play.

• Choose from 5 different gangs and witness the plot unfold in a series of graphical novel narratives.
• Control a team of gangsters and swap between them on the fly as you steal turf while engaging in explosive urban combat.
• Over 60 missions that offer a mix of shooting, tactical battles and multiple driving challenges in a photo realistic London.
• Free roaming city allows you to explore London's most dangerous areas.
• Play a series of mini-games which includes a unique strategy card game, tourist mode, British pub games, and more.

Gangs of London™ © 2006 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Published by Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. Developed by SCEE London Studio. All rights reserved.

Memory Stick Duo™ may be required.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PLAYSTATION®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Gangs of London™
